extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

    • Method Detail

      • isEffectComplete

        public abstract boolean isEffectComplete()
        Tell the main effect if you are done.
        Returns:

      • effectStep

        public abstract void effectStep()
        This will be called at every time interval, so do your business here. Do not quit early in this method, instead implement the other two abstract methods and tell your parent when you are done.

      • effectComplete

        public abstract void effectComplete()
        At the end of each of your steps, this may be called if isEffectComplete now returns true. So do your last bits of work here.

      • completeEffect

        protected void completeEffect()

      • startEffect

        public final void startEffect()
        this should never be overridden it will reset the effectCompleteCount as it will assume no effects have completed yet
